panels.title: Question 1: How big are tenant containers?
Question 2: How big are tenant namespaces?
Question 3: Which tenants are in the "big head" and need XL overrides?
Question 4: What is our overall worker node CPU to Memory Profile? (Pick a worker node type)

options.content:
# Worker Nodes Resources

This dashboard shows the resource consumption exclusively for **worker nodes**

targets.expr: sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!=""} * on (node) group_left() strictly_worker_nodes) / sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate * on (node) group_left() strictly_worker_nodes) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024

sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="memory", unit="byte"} * on(node) group_left() strictly_worker_nodes) / sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"} * on(node) group_left() strictly_worker_nodes) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024

panels.title: Question 5: What is our overall cluster worker node utilization? (Scale node count up/down)

options.content:
# Worker Nodes Resources

This dashboard shows the resource consumption exclusively for **worker nodes**

targets.expr:
sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!=""} * on (node) group_left() strictly_worker_nodes) / 
sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="memory", unit="byte"} * on(node) group_left() strictly_worker_nodes)

sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_memory_working_set_bytes{container!=""} * on (node) group_left() strictly_worker_nodes) / 
sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="memory", unit="byte"} * on(node) group_left() strictly_worker_nodes)

options.content:
# Worker Nodes Resources

This dashboard shows the resource consumption exclusively for **worker nodes**

targets.expr: sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate * on (node) group_left() strictly_worker_nodes) / sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"} * on(node) group_left() strictly_worker_nodes)

sum(node_namespace_pod_container:container_cpu_usage_seconds_total:sum_irate * on (node) group_left() strictly_worker_nodes) / sum(kube_node_status_capacity{resource="cpu", unit="core"} * on(node) group_left() strictly_worker_nodes)
